long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will convert your wrong language typed text from  english letters to correct hebrew letters and the opposite.
All you need to do is to mark the wrong typed text, press Ctrl+Q and that's it!
** Unfortunately the extension doesn't work on Facebook comments and chat ,Whatsapp Web chat messaging and Gmail email fields!
